admissions.table_description: Hospital admissions associated with an ICU stay.

admission_type.description: Type of admission, for example emergency or elective.
admission_type.name: admission_type

admittime.description: Time of admission to the hospital.
admittime.name: admittime

dischtime.description: Time of discharge from the hospital.
dischtime.name: dischtime

edouttime.description: Time that the patient was registered and discharged from the emergency department.
edouttime.name: edouttime

edregtime.description: Time that the patient was registered and discharged from the emergency department.
edregtime.name: edregtime

hadm_id.description: Primary key. Identifies the hospital stay.
hadm_id.name: hadm_id

has_chartevents_data.description: Hospital admission has at least one observation in the CHARTEVENTS table.
has_chartevents_data.name: has_chartevents_data

hospital_expire_flag.description: This indicates whether the patient died within the given hospitalization. 1 indicates death in the hospital, and 0 indicates survival to hospital discharge
hospital_expire_flag.name: hospital_expire_flag

callout.table_description: Record of when patients were ready for discharge (called out), and the actual time of their discharge (or more generally, their outcome).';

acknowledge_status.description: The status of the response to the call out request.
acknowledge_status.name: acknowledge_status

acknowledgetime.description: Time at which the call out request was acknowledged.
acknowledgetime.name: acknowledgetime

callout_outcome.description: The result of the call out request
callout_outcome.name: callout_outcome

callout_service.description: Identifies the service that the patient is called out to.
callout_service.name: callout_service

callout_status.description: Current status of the call out request.
callout_status.name: callout_status

callout_wardid.description: Identifies the ward where the patient is to be discharged to. A value of 1 indicates the first available ward. A value of 0 indicates home.
callout_wardid.name: callout_wardid

createtime.description: Time at which the call out request was created.
createtime.name: createtime

curr_careunit.description: If the ward where the patient is currently residing is an ICU, the ICU type is listed here.
curr_careunit.name: curr_careunit

curr_wardid.description: Identifies the ward where the patient is currently residing.
curr_wardid.name: curr_wardid

currentreservationtime.description: Latest time at which a ward was reserved for the call out request.
currentreservationtime.name: currentreservationtime

discharge_wardid.description: The ward to which the patient was discharged.
discharge_wardid.name: discharge_wardid

firstreservationtime.description: First time at which a ward was reserved for the call out request.
firstreservationtime.name: firstreservationtime

hadm_id.description: Foreign key. Identifies the hospital stay.
hadm_id.name: hadm_id

outcometime.description: Time at which the outcome (cancelled or discharged) occurred.
outcometime.name: outcometime

request_cdiff.description: Indicates if special precautions are required.
request_cdiff.name: request_cdiff

request_mrsa.description: Indicates if special precautions are required.
request_mrsa.name: request_mrsa

request_resp.description: Indicates if special precautions are required.
request_resp.name: request_resp

request_tele.description: Indicates if special precautions are required.
request_tele.name: request_tele

request_vre.description: Indicates if special precautions are required.
request_vre.name: request_vre

submit_careunit.description: If the ward where the call was submitted was an ICU, the ICU type is listed here.
submit_careunit.name: submit_careunit

submit_wardid.description: Identifies the ward where the call out request was submitted.
submit_wardid.name: submit_wardid

updatetime.description: Last time at which the call out request was updated.
updatetime.name: updatetime

caregivers.table_description: List of caregivers associated with an ICU stay.';

description.description: More detailed description of the caregiver, if available.
description.name: description

label.description: Title of the caregiver, for example MD or RN.
label.name: label

chartevents.table_description: Events occuring on a patient chart.';

error.description: Flag to highlight an error with the event.
error.name: error

hadm_id.name: hadm_id

icustay_id.description: Foreign key. Identifies the ICU stay.
icustay_id.name: icustay_id

itemid.description: Foreign key. Identifies the charted item.
itemid.name: itemid

stopped.description: Text string indicating the stopped status of an event (i.e. stopped, not stopped).
stopped.name: stopped

storetime.description: Time when the event was recorded in the system.
storetime.name: storetime

value.description: Value of the event as a text string.
value.name: value

valuenum.description: Value of the event as a number.
valuenum.name: valuenum

warning.description: Flag to highlight that the value has triggered a warning.
warning.name: warning

cptevents.table_description: Events recorded in Current Procedural Terminology.';

chartdate.description: Date when the event occured, if available.
chartdate.name: chartdate

costcenter.description: Center recording the code, for example the ICU or the respiratory unit.
costcenter.name: costcenter

cpt_number.description: Numerical element of the Current Procedural Terminology code.
cpt_number.name: cpt_number

cpt_suffix.description: Text element of the Current Procedural Terminology, if any. Indicates code category.
cpt_suffix.name: cpt_suffix

description.description: Description of the Current Procedural Terminology, if available.
description.name: description

hadm_id.name: hadm_id

sectionheader.description: High-level section of the Current Procedural Terminology code.
sectionheader.name: sectionheader

subsectionheader.description: Subsection of the Current Procedural Terminology code.

ticket_id_seq.description: Sequence number of the event, derived from the ticket ID.
ticket_id_seq.name: ticket_id_seq

d_cpt.table_description: High-level dictionary of the Current Procedural Terminology.';

codesuffix.description: Text element of the Current Procedural Terminology, if any.
codesuffix.name: codesuffix

sectionrange.description: Range of codes within the high-level section.
sectionrange.name: sectionrange

subsectionrange.description: Range of codes within the subsection.
subsectionrange.name: subsectionrange

d_icd_diagnoses.table_description: Dictionary of the International Classification of Diseases, 9th Revision (Diagnoses).';

valuenum.name: valuenum

charttime.description: Time when the event occured, if available.
charttime.name: charttime

dilution_comparison.description: The comparison component of DILUTION_TEXT: either <= (less than or equal), = (equal), or >= (greater than or equal), or null when not available.
dilution_comparison.name: dilution_comparison

dilution_text.description: The dilution amount tested for and the comparison which was made against it (e.g. <=4).
dilution_text.name: dilution_text

dilution_value.description: The value component of DILUTION_TEXT: must be a floating point number.
dilution_value.name: dilution_value

hadm_id.description: Foreign key. Identifies the hospital stay.
hadm_id.name: hadm_id

isolate_num.description: Isolate number associated with the test.
isolate_num.name: isolate_num

category.description: Category of the note, e.g. Discharge summary.
category.name: category

chartdate.description: Date when the note was charted.
chartdate.name: chartdate

charttime.description: Date and time when the note was charted. Note that some notes (e.g. discharge summaries) do not have a time associated with them: these notes have NULL in this column.
charttime.name: charttime

description.description: A more detailed categorization for the note, sometimes entered by free-text.
description.name: description

hadm_id.description: Foreign key. Identifies the hospital stay.
hadm_id.name: hadm_id

iserror.description: Flag to highlight an error with the note.
iserror.name: iserror

storetime.description: STORETIME records the date and time at which a note was saved into the system. Notes with a CATEGORY value of ‘Discharge Summary’, ‘ECG’, ‘Radiology’, and ‘Echo’ never have a STORETIME. All other notes have a STORETIME.
storetime.name: storetime

cgid.description: Identifier for the caregiver who validated the given measurement.
cgid.name: cgid

charttime.description: The time of an output event.
charttime.name: charttime

hadm_id.description: Identifier which is unique to a patient hospital stay.
hadm_id.name: hadm_id

icustay_id.description: Identifier which is unique to a patient ICU stay.
icustay_id.name: icustay_id

iserror.description: A Metavision checkbox where a caregiver can specify that an observation is an error. No other details are provided.
iserror.name: iserror

itemid.description: Identifier for a single measurement type in the database. Each row associated with one ITEMID (e.g. 212) corresponds to an instantiation of the same measurement (e.g. heart rate). Metavision ITEMID values are all above 220000. A subset of commonly used medications in CareVue data have ITEMID values between 30000-39999. The remaining input/output ITEMID values are between 40000-49999.
itemid.name: itemid

newbottle.description: Indicates that a new bag of solution was hung at the given CHARTTIME.
newbottle.name: newbottle

stopped.description: Indicates if the order was disconnected at the given CHARTTIME.
stopped.name: stopped

storetime.description: Records the time at which an observation was manually input or manually validated by a member of the clinical staff.
storetime.name: storetime

subject_id.description: Identifier which is unique to a patient.
subject_id.name: subject_id

value.description: Lists the amount of a substance at the CHARTTIME (when the exact start time is unknown, but usually up to an hour before).
value.name: value

valueuom.description: Lists the unit of measure for the VALUE at the CHARTTIME (when the exact start time is unknown, but usually up to an hour before).
valueuom.name: valueuom

patients.table_description: Patients associated with an admission to the ICU.';

dod.description: Date of death. Null if the patient was alive at least 90 days post hospital discharge.
dod.name: dod

dod_hosp.description: Date of death recorded in the hospital records.
dod_hosp.name: dod_hosp

dod_ssn.description: Date of death recorded in the social security records.
dod_ssn.name: dod_ssn

expire_flag.description: Flag indicating that the patient has died.
expire_flag.name: expire_flag

dose_unit_rx.description: Unit of measurement associated with the dose.
dose_unit_rx.name: dose_unit_rx

drug_name_poe.description: Name of the drug on the Provider Order Entry interface.
drug_name_poe.name: drug_name_poe

form_unit_disp.description: Unit of measurement associated with the formulation.
form_unit_disp.name: form_unit_disp

hadm_id.description: Foreign key. Identifies the hospital stay.
hadm_id.name: hadm_id

icustay_id.description: Foreign key. Identifies the ICU stay.
icustay_id.name: icustay_id

route.description: Route of administration, for example intravenous or oral.
route.name: route

cgid.description: Identifier for each caregiver. The identification number of the provider associated with the procedure record, for example, the provider who performed the procedure.
cgid.name: cgid

comments_canceledby.description: Identifier of the person who canceled the comments.
comments_canceledby.name: comments_canceledby

comments_date.description: Date when the comments were made.
comments_date.name: comments_date

comments_editedby.description: Identifier of the person who edited the comments.
comments_editedby.name: comments_editedby

continueinnextdept.description: Indicates if the procedure will continue in the next department.
continueinnextdept.name: continueinnextdept

hadm_id.description: Identifier for each hospital admission. The unique identifier for the visit during which the procedure took place.
hadm_id.name: hadm_id

icustay_id.description: Identifier for each intensive care unit stay. The identifier for the detailed visit record during which the Procedure took place, such as the Intensive Care Unit stay during the hospital visit.
icustay_id.name: icustay_id

isopenbag.description: Indicates whether the bag is open.
isopenbag.name: isopenbag

itemid.description: Identifier for each item in the procedure. This field houses the unique concept identifier for the procedure. This is used primarily for analyses and network studies.
itemid.name: itemid

linkorderid.description: Identifier for the linked order associated with the procedure.
linkorderid.name: linkorderid

location.description: Location where the procedure was performed.
location.name: location

locationcategory.description: Category of the location where the procedure was performed.
locationcategory.name: locationcategory

ordercategoryname.description: The name of the order category.
ordercategoryname.name: ordercategoryname

orderid.description: Identifier for the order associated with the procedure.
orderid.name: orderid

secondaryordercategoryname.description: The name of the secondary order category.
secondaryordercategoryname.name: secondaryordercategoryname

starttime.description: The time the procedure started. The exact time when the procedure happened.
starttime.name: starttime

statusdescription.description: Description of the status of the procedure.
statusdescription.name: statusdescription

storetime.description: Records the time at which an observation was manually input or manually validated by a member of the clinical staff.
storetime.name: storetime

subject_id.description: Identifier for each patient. The unique identifier of the patient for whom the procedure is recorded. This may be a system generated code.
subject_id.name: subject_id

value.description: Value of the item in the procedure. The original value from the source data that represents the actual procedure performed.
value.name: value

valueuom.description: Unit of measure for the value of the item in the procedure.
valueuom.name: valueuom
